item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在数据修正可能导致美国就业岗位减少一百万个之前，市场走势飘忽不定，而债券市场则对美联储降息押下重注。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Markets drift before data revisions that could wipe away a million US jobs, while the bond market bets big on Fed rate cuts. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 英国石油公司经济学家称 "欧佩克+"恢复石油产量的空间有限
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）首席经济学家斯宾塞-戴尔（Spencer Dale）认为，鉴于美国、巴西和圭亚那的供应量不断增加，OPEC+提高产量的空间有限，因为这将给油价带来压力。【原文：OPEC+ has limited scope to boost output as that would put pressure on oil prices, given increasing supply from the US, Brazil and Guyana, according to BP Plc Chief Economist Spencer Dale.】

item.title: 比特币矿商 Bitfarms 被指正洽谈以 1.64 亿美元收购 Stronghold
item.description: 据知情人士透露，比特币矿业公司Bitfarms Ltd.正在洽谈以约1.64亿美元的价格收购Stronghold Digital Mining Inc.，同时抵御Riot Platforms Inc.的收购企图。【原文：Bitcoin mining company Bitfarms Ltd. is in talks to acquire Stronghold Digital Mining Inc. for about $164 million while fending off a takeover attempt by Riot Platforms Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 鲍威尔面临政策十字路口，杰克逊霍尔备受关注
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将于本周五迎来美联储通胀之战的下一个篇章，预计他将为降息铺平道路，同时向投资者保证决策者可以避免经济急剧放缓。【原文：Chair Jerome Powell will usher in the next chapter in the Federal Reserve’s inflation battle on Friday, when he’s expected to set the table for an interest-rate cut while reassuring investors that policymakers can stave off a sharp economic slowdown.】

item.title: 交易员期待美国就业数据支撑国债反弹
item.description: 已经为美国国债带来更多收益做好准备的投资者将关注美国劳动力市场的修正数据，以寻找美联储需要开始积极降息的迹象。【原文：Investors who’ve positioned for more gains in US Treasuries will look to revised data on the US labor market for signs the Federal Reserve needs to start aggressively slashing interest rates.】

item.title: 债务协议与大选日程冲突，斯里兰卡债券下跌
item.description: 由于投资者担心与债权人达成的债务重组协议可能会因下个月的总统选举而推迟，斯里兰卡的美元债券一路走低。【原文：Sri Lanka’s dollar bonds are drifting lower on investor concern that the completion of a debt restructuring agreement with creditors could be pushed back by next month’s presidential election.】

item.title: 挪威鲑鱼养殖户受到美国需求疲软和鱼病的影响
item.description: 挪威三文鱼养殖户第二季度业绩下滑，原因是受生活成本上升影响，消费者购买的粉红鱼数量减少，而且健康问题也影响了产量。【原文：Norwegian salmon farmers saw their second quarter results drop as consumers hit by the higher cost of living bought less pink fish and health issues hurt yields.】

item.title: 上汽集团将销量下滑归咎于即将到来的欧盟关税
item.description: 中国国有汽车制造商上汽集团表示，由于欧盟准备对中国电动汽车制造商征收进口关税，贸易行动影响了今年的销售。【原文：Chinese state-owned automaker SAIC Motor Corp. said trade actions have affected sales this year as the European Union prepares to hit Chinese electric-vehicle makers with import tariffs.】

item.title: 科技股和中国拖累新兴市场反弹受阻
item.description: 由于中国的经济困境以及美联储杰克逊霍尔会议和英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）财报等风险临近，新兴市场股市创下自8月5日全球暴跌以来的最大跌幅，投资者对此持谨慎态度。【原文：Emerging-market stocks headed for the biggest drop since the Aug. 5 global slump as China’s economic woes and approaching risks including the Federal Reserve’s Jackson Hole conference and earnings from Nvidia Corp. left investors cautious.】

item.title: 沃特金琼斯因房地产市场放缓影响利润而暴跌
item.description: 英国开发商沃特金琼斯公司（Watkin Jones Plc）表示，由于房地产市场放缓限制了其利润增长能力，该公司正在探索更长期的融资方案，此前该公司股价在伦敦交易市场创下一年多来最大跌幅。【原文：Watkin Jones Plc shares plunged the most in over a year in London trading after the UK developer said it’s exploring longer-term funding options as the slowdown in the property market limits its ability to grow profit.】

item.title: 津巴布韦人用黄金支持的 ZiG 支付 40% 的交易
item.description: 财政部常务秘书乔治-古瓦马坦加（George Guvamatanga）说，津巴布韦人使用国家黄金支持货币支付的比例为 40%，而 4 月份刚开始使用时仅为 20%。【原文：Zimbabweans are using the nation’s gold-backed currency for 40% of payments compared with 20% when it first started in April, Finance Permanent Secretary George Guvamatanga said.】

item.title: 雨水充沛，印度农民加大水稻和豆类种植力度
item.description: 到目前为止，印度的季风降雨量高于平均水平，因此水稻和豆类作物的播种量有所增加。【原文：Sowing of rice and pulses crops has increased in India as monsoon rains have been higher than average so far in the season.】

item.title: 中国经济学家敦促中国政府增加借贷以刺激经济增长
item.description: 随着需求不足和低通胀问题继续困扰中国经济，越来越多的中国经济学家呼吁中央政府增加借贷以支持经济增长。【原文：A growing chorus of Chinese economists are calling on the central government to take on more borrowing to support growth as the economy continues to struggle from a lack of demand and low inflation.】

item.title: 南非通胀放缓支持 9 月降息
item.description: 南非的通货膨胀率降至三年来的最低水平，为本季度放松货币政策提供了支持。【原文：South Africa’s inflation rate fell to the lowest level in three years, supporting the case for monetary policy easing this quarter.】

item.title: 中国禁止风险信托为低风险基金销售理财产品
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国要求一些信托公司停止向个人募集资金，为地方政府融资工具提供资金，这是中国为遏制日益增长的金融风险而做出的最新努力。【原文：China told some trust companies to stop raising money from individuals to fund local government financing vehicles, according to people familiar with the matter, in its latest effort to curb growing financial risks.】

item.title: 领导层动荡影响股价，Absa 集团落后于同行
item.description: Absa Group Ltd. 是今年表现最差的南非银行股，落后于同业的强劲反弹，因为该银行正为领导层的不稳定而苦苦挣扎。【原文：Absa Group Ltd. is the worst-performing South African bank stock this year, lagging a strong rally in its peers as the lender struggles with leadership instability】

item.title: 挪威石油管理局称，石油峰值即将来临，挪威应钻探更多石油
item.description: 挪威近海管理局表示，在挪威近海运营的石油和天然气公司需要加大勘探力度，以减缓油气资源在明年之后自然减少的趋势。【原文：Oil and gas companies operating off Norway need to boost exploration to slow a natural decline in hydrocarbon resources after next year, according to the country’s offshore directorate.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势加剧，中国调查矛头直指欧盟乳制品行业
item.description: 中国对从欧盟进口的乳制品发起了反补贴调查，在双方贸易紧张局势不断恶化的情况下，中国在欧盟农业领域的目标又增加了一个。【原文：China has launched an anti-subsidy probe on dairy imports from the European Union, adding to its targets in the bloc’s agriculture industry as trade tensions between the two sides percolate.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德为收购 Grifols 寻求近 100 亿欧元债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）正在要求银行为其对西班牙制药商 Grifols SA 的潜在私有化交易提供高达 95 亿欧元（106 亿美元）的债务支持。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management is asking banks to backstop up to €9.5 billion ($10.6 billion) of debt for its potential take-private deal for Spanish pharmaceutical producer Grifols SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 交易员等待美联储利率线索，欧洲股市保持稳定
item.description: 周三将公布美联储会议纪要和美国非农就业数据，投资者期待有关降息时机的线索，欧洲股市在此之前变化不大。【原文：European equities were little changed ahead of Federal Reserve minutes and US payrolls revisions due on Wednesday as investors anticipate clues about the timing of interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气储存量达到 90%，价格接近两周低点
item.description: 欧洲的天然气储备已接近饱和，这有助于抑制近期因供应风险引发的价格上涨。【原文：Europe’s natural gas reserves are almost full, helping to cap a recent price rally driven by concerns over supply risks.】

item.title: 法院裁决重创佐科威在印尼的王朝遗产
item.description: 印尼宪法法院驳回了一项要求修改地区选举候选人最低年龄限制的申请，使自己与最高法院发生冲突，并有可能阻止总统佐科-维多多的小儿子参加今年中爪哇省副省长的竞选。【原文：Indonesia’s Constitutional Court rejected a petition to change the minimum age limit for candidates in regional elections, putting itself at odds with the Supreme Court and potentially stopping President Joko Widodo’s youngest son from running for deputy governor of Central Java this year.】

item.title: 对中国政策支持持乐观态度，铁矿石连续第三天上涨
item.description: 铁矿石连续第三天上涨，收复了上周暴跌 9% 的跌幅，原因是有迹象表明中国政府将采取更多措施，试图重振中国奄奄一息的房地产市场。【原文：Iron ore rose for a third day — recovering more of its 9% plunge last week — on signs Chinese authorities will take more steps to try and revive the country’s moribund property market.】

item.title: 为生育率下降定价刻不容缓
item.description:
有关生育率骤降的经济和金融研究应该引起投资者的关注。【原文：

 Economic and financial research into plummeting fertility rates should be getting investor attention.

】

item.title: 瑞士中央银行与证券交易所启动即时支付计划
item.description: 从本周二开始，大多数瑞士公司和个人都可以在几秒钟内完成支付，这有望促进企业和消费者的发展。【原文：Most Swiss companies and individuals are able to settle payments in seconds as of Tuesday, in what’s expected to be a boost for business and consumers.】

item.title: 英国预算超支给斯塔默增税带来压力
item.description: 本财年前四个月，英国政府的借贷高于预期，这凸显了基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的工党新政府在提高税收或控制支出方面面临的压力。【原文：UK government borrowing came in higher than forecast in the first four months of the fiscal year, highlighting the pressure on Keir Starmer’s new Labour government to raise taxes or curb spending.】

item.title: Ola Electric 股价在上市后大涨 90%，价值达到 70 亿美元
item.description: Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 股价的快速上涨证明了创始人推动公司上市的初衷是正确的，尽管最初人们对估值持怀疑态度。【原文：The rapid rise in Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. shares is vindicating the founder’s push to list the company despite initial skepticism over valuation.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：股市将上涨，英镑维持在 1.30 美元上方
item.description: 2024年7月29日星期一，行人从英国伦敦金融城的英格兰银行（BOE）外经过。如果英国央行本周晚些时候选择降息，英镑大幅回落的可能性正在增加。摄影师：Jason Alden/Bloomberg【原文：Pedestrians pass outside the Bank of England (BOE) in the City of London, UK, on Monday, July 29, 2024. The chances of a sharp retreat in the British pound are growing if the Bank of England opts to lower interest rates later this week. Photographer: Jason Alden/Bloomberg】

item.title: 拥挤的比特币衍生品押注引发 "空头挤压 "警告
item.description: 据加密货币专家K33 Research称，比特币衍生品市场发出的一个信号表明，"空头挤压 "的风险越来越大，这可能会刺激最大的数字资产大幅反弹。【原文：A signal from the Bitcoin derivatives market points to the growing risk of a “short squeeze” that can stoke sharp rallies in the largest digital asset, according to cryptocurrency specialist K33 Research.】
